A Set end, Clear start     B Set start, Clear end
0 00000000                 0 11111111
1 00000001                 1 11111110
2 00000011                 2 11111100
3 00000111                 3 11111000
4 00001111                 4 11110000
5 00011111                 5 11100000
6 00111111                 6 11000000
7 01111111                 7 10000000
8 11111111                 8 00000000

bit ss  se  cs  ce
0   B0  A1  A0  B1
1   B1  A2  A1  B2
2   B2  A3  A2  B3
3   B3  A4  A3  B4
4   B4  A5  A4  B5
5   B5  A6  A5  B6
6   B6  A7  A6  B7
7   B7  A8  A7  B8

 0 00000000
 1 00000001
 2 00000011
 3 00000111
 4 00001111
 5 00011111
 6 00111111
 7 01111111
 8 11111111
 9 11111110
10 11111100
11 11111000
12 11110000
13 11100000
14 11000000
15 10000000
16 00000000

bit ss  se  cs  ce
0    8   1   0   9
1    9   2   1  10
2   10   3   2  11
3   11   4   3  12
4   12   5   4  13
5   13   6   5  14
6   14   7   6  15
7   15   8   7  16

	static const u8 bits[] = { 0x00,0x01,0x03,0x07,0x0F,0x1F,0x3F,0x7F,0xFF,
				   0xFE,0xFC,0xF8,0xF0,0xE0,0xC0,0x80,0x00 };

bit ss        se        cs        ce
0   11111111  00000001  00000000  11111110
1   11111110  00000011  00000001  11111100
2   11111100  00000111  00000011  11111000
3   11111000  00001111  00000111  11110000
4   11110000  00011111  00001111  11100000
5   11100000  00111111  00011111  11000000
6   11000000  01111111  00111111  10000000
7   10000000  11111111  01111111  00000000

ss	x = (0xFF << bit);
se	x = (0xFF >> (7 - bit));
cs	x = (0xFF >> (8 - bit));
ce	x = (0xFE << bit);
